ui_interface_description: Navigating the interface, side panels, status bar, built-in terminal.
file_management_description: Opening folders, working with multiple projects, file explorer.
code_editing_description: Syntax, IntelliSense suggestions, auto-complete, code navigation.
advanced_editing_description: Multiple cursors, selection, keyboard shortcuts, code refactoring.
extensions_management_description: Adding new features, configuring extensions, marketplace.
debugging_description: Setting breakpoints, inspecting variables, configuring the debugger.
git_integration_description: Basic Git operations, viewing changes, conflicts, branches.
customization_description: Changing themes, icons, configuring user and project settings.
automation_description: Creating tasks, integrating build tools, automating scripts.
remote_work_description: Editing code on remote servers, SSH configuration, Remote Development.
docker_integration_description: Managing containers, working with Kubernetes clusters, configuring environments.
